Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Aspartylglucosaminuria ( AGU ) is a rare disorder of glycoprotein metabolism caused by the deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase ( AGA ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Aspartylglucosaminuria (AGU) |
| deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA) |

Explanation:

1. Aspartylglucosaminuria (AGU): This is a disease entity as it is a medical condition mentioned in the paragraph.
2. deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA): This is also a disease entity as it is a medical condition caused by the deficiency of the enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Aspartylglucosaminuria (AGU) |

Explanation:

1. Aspartylglucosaminuria (AGU): This is the only clear disease entity mentioned in the paragraph.
2. deficiency of the lysosomal enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA) is not a disease entity, but rather a medical condition caused by the deficiency of the enzyme aspartylglucosaminidase (AGA).
